name: Shining Force: The Sword of Hajya (GG)
name_original: Shining Force: The Sword of Hajya (GG)
description:
Shining Force: Sword of Hajya (EU, AU), Shining Force Gaiden II: Jashin no Kakusei (JP).
The peaceful kingdom of Cypress has suddenly been disrupted by the corrupt ambition of the evil King Iom. Terror rampages across the land. The Castle of Cypress is invaded and the magical Sword of Hajya is taken! It will take strength, courage, agility and your keen sense of strategy to defy this ominous power.
